entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 8.0°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 28 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
